scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Saint Jerome, identifiable by his halo and scholarly attire, seated and writing on a scroll. He is accompanied by his attribute, a lion, which sits attentively beside him. The figures are positioned within an architectural setting characterized by an arched opening supported by columns. A draped canopy, possibly part of a bed or a symbolic representation of a divine presence, is visible behind Saint Jerome. The background features a wall with paneling, suggesting an interior space. The overall composition evokes a sense of quiet contemplation and scholarly pursuit, aligning with the traditional iconography of Saint Jerome.
